bug.author: JimmyWhitaker
bug.summary: Posted output to job that did not exist
bug.description: When executing a job, occasionally the worker and server get disconnected. Server receives the error: posted output to job that did not exist

comments.comment: I believe this is caused by the server restarting and deleting the current jobs on restart. Initially, this was required (before jobs could be deleted) but now this config setting should be removed.
